```{r}

```

```{r}
#exists("hxfel9919_request")

separated<- charge_text %>%
              mutate(code = as.integer(substring(CHRGTEXT,1,4)),
                     explanation = substring(CHRGTEXT,6,length(CHRGTEXT)))

```

```{r}
separated %>% 
  group_by(code) %>% 
  count()
  
```
